heading: what's on aol tonite?
subheading: soon after aol confirmed it had purchased webtv rival netchannel and begun developing aoltv, wired dispatched me to dulles, virginia, for a bit of dumpster diving. sure enough, i found a plan to package television programming and net services all in one interface. take a look at aol’s brainstorm below. says barry schuler, president of […]
author: zev borow
